attributes.action: The BBC SHOULD LOOSE ITS FUNDING AS IT NO LONGER REPRESENTS THE VIEWS OF THE  UK
attributes.additional_details: I have lived, worked and played all my life on Merseyside. I am 73 years of age and care desperately about the future of our people and their wellbeing.For more information look at Debrett's "People of Today"
attributes.background: I strongly believe that the BBC has a left wing bias. IT DOES NOT REPRESENT THE SILENT MAJORITY. Nobody cares about the North of England, Wales or Ulster; not to mention Scotland! We all need to stand up for our Nation and our people without fear of being castigated as racist.
